message: Dear Bob, I'm excited to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. This item holds significant value to me and I believe it would be a valuable addition to your collection or business. Considering its unique features and the benefits it offers, I am offering it to you at a special price of $12,000. I understand that it's valued at $8,000 to you, but this offer represents a fantastic chance to secure a high-quality product at a competitive rate. Please let me know if you're interested in discussing further details or proceeding with the purchase. Looking forward to your response.
